stories.title: 2FA Directory: List of websites and whether or not they support 2FA
Show HN: Consistent file uploading experience for IRC

stories.text:
There are around one billion active football fans in the world. They read several websites for getting news, results, statistics and videos. Free time is becoming less and less available, and the existing sites write about all the clubs and players. We need to look for relevant content.

I'm working on creating a single channel of football content with personalized preferences. It updates few times during the day.

Now you gain more free time and enjoy the best information about your favorites in football world.
stories.title: Show HN: Statz – personalized football content into one feed
